column4: i've a problem with my firefox, it's doesn't work,,how i can fix it?
XPCOMGlueLoad error for file /usr/lib/firefox-10.0/libxpcom.so:
libxul.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
Couldn't load XPCOM.
did you install some non-standard version of Firefox?
: i have an update for firefox 10
what sort of update?
uninstall that "update", and go back to the official Ubuntu package, most likely.
: mmm,,how to uninstall that update?
i don't know, tell us how you installed it.
ok look, what does "apt-cache poloicy firefox" say
ok look, what does "apt-cache policy firefox" say
put the whole output in http://paste.ubuntu.com/ please
: An error has occurred in the Pastebin software. Please notify the administrators.
it works for me, try again
: http://paste.ubuntu.com/810746/plain/
first, delete any file having to do with firefox/mozilla from /etc/apt/sources.list.d
sudo rm /etc/apt/sources.list.d/*firefox*   (type this carefully)
: done,,,
now type "sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get remove firefox; sudo apt-get install firefox"
nope, no pulseaudio used here
: i don't understand about mecanism audio,,how it work?
